TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MediaPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class MediaPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

Docs.summary: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 执行安全操作。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute>控制音频、图像和视频媒体在部分信任 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的工作能力。 允许的声明的范围取决于所使用的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> 。
安全特性声明的安全信息存储在属性目标的元数据中, 由系统在运行时进行访问。 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。 对于命令性安全, 请使用相应的权限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission>类。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何要求调用代码在链接时不受<xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>限制。 要求通常在托管库 (Dll) 中进行, 以帮助保护方法或类免受潜在的有害代码的影响。
[!code-csharp[SecurityPermissionsSnippets#MediaPermissionAttribute1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SecurityPermissionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mediapermissionattribute1)] [!code-vb[SecurityPermissionsSnippets#MediaPermissionAttribute1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SecurityPermissionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mediapermissionattribute1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format:
## Remarks 默认媒体值为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio.AllAudio>、 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.NoImage>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo.NoVideo>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute>。
[!code-csharp[SecurityPermissionsSnippets#MediaPermissionAttribute13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SecurityPermissionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mediapermissionattribute13)] [!code-vb[SecurityPermissionsSnippets#MediaPermissionAttribute13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SecurityPermissionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mediapermissionattribute13)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::MediaPermissionAudio Audio { System::Security::Permissions::MediaPermissionAudio get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::MediaPermissionAudio value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取或设置 的音频权限级别。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 默认值为 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio.SafeAudio>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute.Audio%2A>属性的用法。
[!code-csharp[SecurityPermissionsSnippets#MediaPermissionAttribute4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SecurityPermissionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mediapermissionattribute4)] [!code-vb[SecurityPermissionsSnippets#MediaPermissionAttribute4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SecurityPermissionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mediapermissionattribute4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法应仅由安全系统调用, 而不是由应用程序代码调用。
在编译时, 特性将安全声明转换为元数据中的序列化格式。 元数据中的声明性安全数据是根据此方法返回的与此属性对应的权限创建的。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::MediaPermissionImage Image { System::Security::Permissions::MediaPermissionImage get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::MediaPermissionImage value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
